context: Hello how are you, can you recommend a movie?
The Conjuring (2013) well I like it a lot
I did not see it but I saw the trailer and it seemed very good, do you recommend another bro?
or I can also recommend this Saw (2003)
that movie is also good, recommend me another bro?
if you want to see another one it can also be It (1990)
how good is that good, please recommend another
resp: and another very good one would be The Last Exorcism (2010)

context.content: "Enchanted (2007)" is a delightful mix of live-action and animation, following the story of Giselle, a fairytale princess who is banished from her animated land and ends up in real-life New York City. The film balances humor through Giselle's fish-out-of-water experiences in the modern world, emotional moments as she navigates love and friendship, and family-friendliness with its positive messages and enchanting storytelling. The main characters include Giselle, played by Amy Adams, and Robert, played by Patrick Dempsey. It's a heartwarming and entertaining film for the whole family!
